Name: Bunny
Title: Amazing Krishna temple....
Review: It was a very good experience. Beautiful place to visit. The idols are so beautiful, you will just stand infornt of them mesmerized.

Name: naveen
Title: Wonderful temple originally started by Srila Prabhupada the real original Hare Krishna temple in Hyderabad
Review: Beautiful temple with nice prasadam and wonderful kirtans and high class deity worship pls visit and be blessed.

Name: Nagaraj Bangalore
Title: Peaceful Temple
Review: In comparison to other ISKCON temple, this is a small but beautiful temple and relaxes your mind. Gandhi bhavan is the metro station close by and was not too crowded on the weekend.

Name: Kaushik G
Title: Small temple
Review: During our vacation in Hyderabad, we had visited this small but beautiful temple dedicated to Radha Krishna. Please note that temple opens at 4.30 in the afternoon. We enjoyed yummy badam milk at the Govinda sweet shop outside the temple. We liked the ambiance and the beautiful decor of the deities in the temple.

Name: Sundaresh
Title: A best ISKCON Temple
Review: Centrally located  with rich architecural temple. A temple with parking and nice restaurant run by ISKCON. A ghee prasad not to be missed and to share with family and freinds.

Name: Krishna Sandeep Siram
Title: Very Peaceful place to visit
Review: The Place which spreads devotion and find peace . A place Where Hindu tradition is still alive and Its a kind of experience to visit this place.

Name: Anita M
Title: Darshan
Review: Pathetic experience, devotees behavior worst thank normal people, very rude, temple is nicely built, but devotees behavior is like a big black spot

Name: Sunil
Title: Jai krishna
Review: ISKCON is always a special place in all the states. The place is build it in hush place and well maintained. Best place to visit and to seek blessings from lord krishna.Highly recommend to all the family

Name: Prashant P
Title: Divine but not as Grand
Review: Having visited most of the Iskcon temples across India, this was a tad "less grand". Rest of it was like the Hallmark Iskcon Chain; full of Divinity.

Name: Pagadalasiddhartha
Title: Best place
Review: Peaceful place and good stay when your are not in good mood for peace and relaxationEnvironment is good

Name: sree143in
Title: Sri krishna
Review: Iscon tempel is very nice architecture built in very big area, god sree krishna along with RAdha gives you darshan here.

Name: NIL_MODI
Title: Beautiful and Peaceful
Review: ISKCON temple is very beautiful and having very peaceful atmosphere. Also there is a restaurant inside the campus. Wonderful temple.

Name: Mohankrishna Eluri
Title: Very very cool place and no one will distrub you .
Review: Place wich spreds divotion  and everone will find  peace in  that place .A place  Where Hindu tradition is still alive .

Name: Vivek G
Title: Aarthi n prayer in the evening
Review: I was in a service apartment in the SD road area and saw this place every evening during my walk. Stepped inside a few times and wanted to attend the 7pm Aarthi. It happened one evening. About 10 or so people were in attendance and prayer was beautiful. About 20 minutes. Really blissful experience and very happy to be privileged to attend.

Name: SRIKAKOLAPU
Title: great
Review: Dont miss the aarthi if you are visiting this temple and also its well maintained and it looks rich as any other iskon temple in the country

Name: Dilip kumar
Title: Historical place
Review: This temple is situated in many places in the country.It has got its importance and give your mind peace and energised.

Name: GoWrong
Title: Jai Shri Krishna
Review: Tucked in a busy area but is beautiful from inside. Idol is specially very beautiful. If you happen to be there during Aarti the experience is really euphoric.

Name: Tour785520
Title: I must vist place for those who follow ISKON
Review: This place was built in late 60s under direct supervision and planning by Srila Prabhupada swamiji himselfHe personally lead the procession in Nampally to Adids area.We were lucky to physically see and follow.I am not sure,but I think this was first ISKON temple in India.Later on we saw the movement picking up in Big wayProbably it was also beginning of revival of Hindusm in HyderabdThose who follow ISKON movement must visit this temple,as this place  has soul and foot prints of Srila Prabhu pada

Name: Mukta2016
Title: Nice Temple
Review: The ISKON temple in Hyderabad is very centrally located. The architecture of the temple is very beautiful and the temple premises are maintained very well. We had good darshan of Lord Krishna here.

Name: Arun Karthik
Title: Divine Place
Review: ISKON is known all over for being some of the most beautiful, active, spiritual and religious centers in the country. One such ISKON temple can be found in the Nampally region in Hyderabad. The main deity in the temple is Lord Krishna. One can also see idols of Sri Gaura-Nitai, Sri Jagannatha Baladeva-Subhadra and Sri Radha Madana-Mohana. The temple carries out programs of Pujas and Aartis every day while on Sundays, special programs are organized.The architecture of this temple is magnificent. The steps of the temple have various halts that lead to further ends of the temple. By side, there are shops and beautiful fountains add to the spirituality of this shrine. Inside the shrine, the sight of idols makes one muse over the godly world. Draped with rich clothes and jewelry, the idols are decked with great delicacy and care. In the center hall, one can always hear the heavenly tune of Hare Rama Hare Krishna. Many devotional lectures and addresses are arranged for the benefit and spiritual nerve of devotees. Also known as Sri Sri Radha-Madana-Mohana temple at Nampally Station Road this temple serve everyone as a center of the cultural, spiritual, educational and social activities given to raise the lives of people here. The followers hold sessions in institutes, corporates, etc., to teach the techniques of spiritualizing daily life

Name: Anirban19812015
Title: quite large beautiful temple
Review: Hyderbad ISKCON is quite large & centrally located. You will get prasadam if you visit in the evening (no cost).Inside the temple shopping stalls are there with lots of things to buy.

Name: Milind Kshirsagar
Title: Peace and Spirituality
Review: Very serene, sublime and spiritual place. A must visit if you are spiritually aligned. Nicely decorated beautiful idols and wall paintings.

Name: Sumit S
Title: Beautiful
Review: A beautiful temple to visit for followers of Krishna. You even get good food in the restaurant of the temple

Name: Durga D
Title: Iskcon temple, Nampally, Hyderbad
Review: Centrally located temple in Hyderabad. They have rooms for overnight stay and need to be booked in advance. Every Sunday there is free lunch prasadam.

Name: AnupamSaurabh
Title: A nice Iskcon temple in middle of Hyderabad
Review: We had difficulty in reaching there in the crowded street. Fortunately being a Sunday, adjacent market was closed. I could park my car in adjacent lane.Temple is smaller than in Bangalore. It has the influence of Jagannath temple.

Name: Trending T
Title: Must visit
Review: This place has got good ambiance and its calmness will make you stronger and confident in your life and will make your way.

Name: Devaa
Title: A nice structure in a densely populated area!!!
Review: A nice beautifully done up temple in white marble. Weekends are very crowded thronging with devotees. Nice bhajans and arati.

Name: Dinesh_cbe
Title: Nice Temple
Review: Visited this temple in the evening. Very beautiful structure and iconic ISKCON architecture. Peaceful and calm with Lord's blessings. Cleanliness is appreciable.

Name: RamaraoKalose
Title: Temple is good and stay was just reasonable (old guest house)
Review: Stay since was at old guest house , though AC but rest of the facilities are not at all upto our expectations.. never knew the delux rooms, could have tried. Location is ok

Name: maheshshinde2017
Title: 3 days visit to Hyderabad
Review: Excellent Service at Guest House of ISKCON Hyderabad. Humble people around serving the guest house...I reached midnight 2.30 am and got a very good response from security people to welcome and show the guest house way...

Name: Prasun S
Title: ISKCON Hyderabad place of blessings
Review: A beautiful place near Abides Hyderabad. In the morning the Hare Krishna chanting cleans all the melancholy of your mind and gives you a pure delight.

Name: rameshbabus2016
Title: Mesmerising
Review: Excellent place and great experience of peaceful mind worshipping and chanting lord krishna maha raj ki,...

Name: shivaraikod
Title: Radhe Radhe
Review: Radhe radhe prevails in the entire temple with Lord Krishna everywhere. One must visit this temple for a peaceful day

Name: Bijan P
Title: Stay in Hyderabad ISKCON on June 2018
Review: Hyderabad ISKCON is in Abids. The temple is wonderful, the location to get the temple is little trcky but for local people it will be super easy. People who are outside from Hyderabad should ask taxi or auto drivers to take them to "Big Temple near to Abids Post Office" . The temple is quite old and it is one of a temple where Srila Prabhupada installed the deities personally. The temple is really serene and it provides spiritual connection while a person is inside the premises.The temple is hosting Radha Krishna, Gaur Nitai, and Jagannath,Baladev, Subhadra. All the Artis are good to see. I must recommend to go to Mangala Arti if you are in a near by place. Lot of in house and outside devotees come to the temple to do Mangala Aarti in the morning at 4:30 AM.  The temple is also having Govinda restaurant which serves different type delicious food starting from Lunch to Dinner. Lot of Snacks and other shops are also there which are purely vegetarian without onion and garlic. During lunch hour you will only be able to get North Indian and South Indian Thali. I would recommend people to have snacks and lunch if they are going to the temple in those timing as I found them tasty. All in all there is spiritual taste connected with good infrastructure and eating areas. I have given 4 as it is little difficult to find else the place is wonderful. I suggest people should visit to the temple who are planning to halt in Hyderabad.

Name: Sunil G
Title: Good devotional place
Review: If you want to search for your inner peace then this is the place. Its very well maintained temple and very clean.

Name: idea614354
Title: its iskon temple
Review: a beautiful temple construction, a mesmerizing place, peaceful time spends, best evening starts here for me.

Name: ayushagarwals022
Title: Very Nice temple.
Review: Iskon temples all over India are known for their architecture and ambiance and this is also not an exception. Well managed and maintained temple.

Name: Debsree Pande
Title: Beautiful - Calm
Review: Temple is well maintained. Lord Krishna's birthday is celebrated in a very beautiful way and also rath yatra,

Name: SSSUUUNNNNNNYYY
Title: Nice
Review: Its a nice & peaceful temple, located in center of city. Parking is little difficult there. Not a must visit.

Name: NEMMARAPARAMESWARAN
Title: Nice place cool situation for meditation
Review: The visit was excellent and memorable one the place is best for meditation and piece of mind.Its in heart of city and veey much close to all shopping complex.

Name: Ganesh N
Title: ISKCON Hyderabad Sri Sri Radha Ma
Review: it was very very very peaceful place i never seen like this temple i feel happy to see thisnice place lord krishna is looks very pleasant

Name: vicky v
Title: Peace of Mind
Review: Want to get some peace of Mind from daily routine this is one of the best place to visit, chant along with devoteesto forget what happens in life & have a great start again

Name: Sunkara T
Title: Beautiful place with peace
Review: Lord Krishna is praised in this temple. It has a large garden space, sculptures and more. Went along with my family and enjoyed a lot. Had a great scope for outdoor photography.

Name: kalyan kumar g
Title: nice visit
Review: nice visit, nice temple, one of the famous temple in hyderabad, we have to knows about historical places,

Name: Sumitkumar_13
Title: Tranquil
Review: Really a nice place to pray and meditate. You can spend few hours to listen to the preaching for spiritual healing

Name: vinitasaraf2015
Title: Huge ISKCON Temple
Review: This place is similar to all ISKCON temples across the world. They serve prasad and it is very serene

Name: Pulak
Title: Hare Krishna!!!!!
Review: Its another of similar ISKCON temple which are all across India. Nicely maintained pure vegetarian food also available

Name: ISKCON_Comm_INDIA
Title: Harekrishna
Review: The temple premises consists of govindas restaurant, snacks, Guest rooms, concert Hall. The day of visit on Sunday will be special.

Name: Gugan_Ilango
Title: NICE temple
Review: ISKCON Hyderabad  temple is located near to station road and is a beautiful temple.very well maintained

Name: Veer2468
Title: Radhe Radhe!
Review: This temple is definitely a must visit in Hyderabad. What a beautiful temple and very peaceful. Very clean

Name: MumbaiIndia
Title: Excellent Temple, Great Stay options best location
Review: We are a life members and hence stayed in the guest house of this temple.  Excellent location right in the heart of city.  Very close to the Nampalli station.  Food is also very good.  There is a govinda restaurant which has many food options at very reasonable price.  you also get opportunity to participate in various Aarti's during the day.

Name: Nikhhil Agarwal
Title: Jai Shri Krishna
Review: Must visit, very big and clean temple, superb feeling and great people, suitable timings availbale for all

Name: chanderrohra
Title: hare krishna
Review: unlike othet iskon temples this is a smaller one situated in hyderabad but temple is so quiet and calmif u r in hyderabad must visit this

Name: shivaraikod
Title: Radhe radhe
Review: A peaceful place to fall in the god's lap. I always visit temples for peaceful atmosphere as everyone around here just prays and are in sync for peace.

Name: yogya_iam
Title: Lost in the divinity of krishna bhajans
Review: Temple is not different from other ISKCON temples including their special restaurant. Do not forget to take prasad. I visited in the evening during Aarti. Mesmerizing moment.

Name: Kartheek_puli
Title: Jagannadh swamy Radhyatra
Review: The calm and peaceful environment over here makes an individual chant the divine words "||Hare Krsna Hare Krsna Krsna Krsna Hare Hare,Hare Rama Hare Rama Rama Rama Hare Hare||"

Name: Gourav Sharma
Title: Nice place
Review: Its a good place to visit with family. avoid weekends and national holidays due to crowd.you can reach there by metro/bus/taxi.

Name: ravirjy
Title: Hare krishna Hare krishna Krishna Krishna Hare Hare Hare Rama Hare rama Rama Rama Hare Hare
Review: One of the good temples in hyderabad. The idols are well designed and devotees like/pray like anything. My mind will refreshed after visiting this divine place. very well recommended for Krishna devotees. I love this place. Please visit once

Name: Srinivas_darbha
Title: Typical Lord Krishna experience
Review: ISKCON has been great in spreading Krishna awareness throughout the world. In Hyderabad , we have two such temple in India. This temple is in Abids area and relatively larger temple. You have a nice book stall and excellent Prasadam Counter. The Idols are fabulous and you can get divine feeling immediately. You can sit and meditate on week days. Weekends , relatively more people attend here.

Name: Rajani K
Title: Krishna temple
Review: This is located in a serene place. Like all ISKCON temples in India, this temple is a modern period temple. It is white colored and beautifully architected.  The prayer schedule here involves aarti in evening and morning. We participated in the morning aarti. Aarti includes singing Krishna bhajans, hymns, mantras chanting and even dancing to the tune of music. It was a heart touching and wonderful experience.

Name: TTDh
Title: Not the normal ISKON centers
Review: Having seen other ISKON centers, this is a small center.A peaceful place within the city, one can sit for some time and pray/meditate/contemplate. Not a must see on a tour, we happend to visit this place since we had some time to spare before we caught the train and this place was on the way.Also, the place has a satvik restaurant run by ISKON and food here was good.

Name: parusharouthud
Title: very excellent peace full and beautiful temple in a very busy location of Hyderabad city near Abids and nampally
Review: Mind blowing and peace full temple similarly like the Temple at Ahmadabad in Gujarat state. It si inside the  Road from Abids to Nampally station road. Though it is in a busy location the atmosphere in temple is very lovely , peaceful and  mind blowing.

Name: Dipraj N
Title: For the spiritual self
Review: ISKCON temples are known to be doors that are open for all. The temple is no different. I have only been once but loved my stay and have recommended people visiting the city since. They also hold the 'Sunday Feast' - much like other ISKCON temples. Also an opportunity for discussion and awareness of philosophy at the least.

Name: Mintstar
Title: Beautiful Idols of Lord Krishna & Radha
Review: Hare Krishna !!Wonderful temple to visit...Idols of lord Krishna and Radha are very much pleasing...we can't able to take our eyes off...Bhajans they do are very pleasing to here...Our heart does allow us to come out of the temple...Feels like we are gaining some positive energy...We come out of the temple very happily...Prasadam tastes delicious...Hare Krishna Hare Rama !!

Name: vinod_k31
Title: Hare Krishna
Review: The Temple complex is huge. Located at Abids one of the busy places in Hyderabad.Temple book shop need to have more collections of books.Temple is worth visiting and seek blessings from Lord Krishna.I had visited this place on my Visit to Hyderabad for a family function near Shankar Mutt.

Name: pjanil1968
Title: Divine Temple
Review: Divine and serene atmosphere. Must visit temple in the heart of city. Very calm and quiet temple. I love visiting this Lord Krishna temple very much

Name: Im O
Title: Iskcon temple
Review: Iskcon temple is very pleasant place here all round chanting sound of radha krishan sooth the soul..this place is beautiful and well maintenaned also

Name: sandeep g
Title: pleasent place
Review: very good and spiritual place to visit , you find very peace full , visiting with family is the best part

Name: SrinivasGupta
Title: GOD'S PARADISE
Review: Its a Magnificent Place, Its a completely devotinal atmosphere place which serves as a centre of Culture, Spiritual, Educational, Social activities to the people all over the world, its a very good place for meditation, Prasadam is very tasty and delicious, we can buy pure food items in the temple.........

Name: Ganeshbabu C
Title: iskcon temple nampally Hyderabad
Review: its a divine and well maintained radhakrishna mandir at nampally,Hyderabad.when i worked in nampally i used to pay avisit every day the temple and habituated to meditate atleast for a five minute span. The atmosphere is very calm and having serenity over flowing with bhakthi tatwa. The sevadal members work immensely to maintain cleanliness and utmost descipline is maintained here.On several festive days like krishnaastami huge crowd from all over the city comes for a darsan .it is unique and divine.   ganeshbabu chebolu, Hyderabad.

Name: DreamerDisha
Title: Lord Krishna's place is always amazing
Review: A very calm experience. Do visit the Govinda restaurant for some great sattvic food. Very close to a shopping market. Centrally located

Name: amitthecreator
Title: ISKCON - Sri Sri Radha Madanmohan
Review: Really beautiful temple of govinda . a must visit for all  tourists visiting hyderabad . the ambiance is full of spirituality and positivity . small shops outside from where souvenirs can be bought . Amazing place to go !!

Name: abhishekhmittal
Title: Very Beautiful, peaceful and serene...Hare Krishna \!/
Review: It's really an awesome place to forget the busy life style and dwell deep into the diving experience! Especially attend the Arthi anytime and you will feel the bliss. One can find more devotees on weekends.

Name: Bibhu Acharya
Title: Place for the Devout
Review: Right in the middle of the bustling market place at Abids, one if the oldest in Hyderabad, is this island of tranquility and devotion. The original paryer hall of ISKCON has idols of Radha Krisha, Jagannath trinity and Nitai Gaurang that are offered daily puja and aarti. They organise special festivities on the occasion of Janmashtami, Rath Yatra etc.Parking is bit of a problem

Name: Rajani B
Title: Very clean and well maintained
Review: The temple is spotlessly clean and very well maintained. It is dedicated to Lord Krishna. Aarti is conducted every morning and evening. It's good to visit during aarti to be a part of this enchanting way of worship. Enchanting of mantras and singing bhajans was so fulfilling and engaging. You really feel the holy energy here.

Name: Rao1940497
Title: My Fav
Review: Visited this shrine and stayed in it's guest house for long. This place is known for it's Divinity. good ambience, centrally located.

Name: shruti161
Title: A very peaceful place
Review: Its a peaceful place in the midst of the city which makes you feel calm and tranquil. Its maintained very well and the place is clean and tidy.

Name: Rajashekhar K
Title: ISKCON - Sri Sri Radha Madanmohan Mandir
Review: One of the most peaceful place :) very neatly maintained. must visit place . evening is the best time to visit.

Name: sudha966
Title: visit to iskcon
Review: Jai sri krishna.  a good feel when you visit this place.  good restaurant adjacent.  people from all walks of life visit this place.  it is in city centre.

Name: None I
Title: Jai Shree Krishna
Review: ISKCON have several temples across the globe.  This one in Hyderabad located in the centre of the city and is very well maintained temple. We visited in the evening time. The atmosphere in the temple had all divinity in it.  We attended the aarti. It was very well organised and felt very soothing.

Name: ανιѕнєк dαѕ
Title: Krishna, all the way!
Review: The temple for ISKCON at Hyderabad is one of the smaller one in comparison to other ones across India. It is spread over ideally a very large area but only has the Ground Floor hence looks small. There is space for Car Parking for max 5 - 8 Cars as it is actually not a designated place.Come just on time & you would be able to see the deities without any rush!

Name: anithaaravamuthan
Title: Hare Krishna Hare Krishna!!!
Review: Beautiful and a wonderful architectural temple situated in Hyderabad. The place is very dvine and clean. Many devotees are coming to this temple to get the Lord krishna darshan. Hare Krishna!!!

Name: yojanaredd
Title: Lord Krishna
Review: It is situated near Metro showroom in abids.if you are a devotee of lord krishna it is a must visit place. the krishna statue in the temple is awesome if we see it we can feel the positive energy and makes your mind very pleasant

Name: Naveen M
Title: Meditation center.
Review: ISKCON is located all over the world and this is HYD branch to get refreshed, very busy at times on sunday.

Name: Raneshtalari
Title: Hare Krisha
Review: Nice place for recreation and rejuvenate, mediate. Specially busy on holidays and Krishna devotees are found here.

Name: Chintan Hefa
Title: Divine Peace !!!
Review: This Iskon Temple is not so huge unlike other Iskon's I have visited across the nation. But one thing in common in all ISKON is Divine Peace !!!Must visit

Name: Anisha N
Title: Temple
Review: Its a  krishna temple from ISKCON group .. same as any other ISKCON in other cities.. go for bhajans and offering prayers when tired have chat food outside

Name: PankajKumarSingh
Title: Nice place to connect with Lord Radha and Krishna to their devotee.
Review: Only one line to say. This place is very good where people can submerged themselves in Lord Radha and krishna. This place also provide the peace of mind.

Name: NIDYAD
Title: PEACE
Review: No words can describe this place. Its a place where u can relax and find peace.don't miss the food is too guuuudddddd. :)

Name: lankavignesh
Title: peaceful radha temple
Review: the temple of lord krishna is very peaceful and i like the food in the temple it is very tasty and a good place to visit.

Name: Abhijit C
Title: Isckon guest house..best place to stay in Hyderabad
Review: we stay in Isckon guest house which is just beside the temple in the same building...rooms are excelent..we booked dbl ac dlx room @1500 only..you can book the room by phone in advance...non ac rooms are also available at 500/700/1000...for food we found an excelent resturant (hotel Grand) at a walking distance...southindian breakfast will be available in their own resturant "govindas"

Name: KS_Trip2014
Title: Great place to visit ISKCON
Review: Good place to visit. Srila Prabhupad himself stayed at this temple. Great kirtan, food restaurant also available.

Name: santosh2ind
Title: Iskcon temple
Review: This is beautiful temple in hyderabad. lord krishna radha and gopikas are very beautiful. every one have to visit this tempe.

Name: shirishasantosh
Title: Iscon temple
Review: This is very beautiful place to visit in hyderabad. lord krishna. radha and gopikas are very beautiful.

Name: indiragogineni
Title: Good
Review: The kitchen in ISKCON is by far too good...well maintained and hygienic...but the Hyderabad premise is not as clean as the one in Chennai.

Name: gouthamkatangur
Title: Great vegetarian food
Review: We can be sure of good quality food as ISKN folks cook food as if it is prasad they offer. You will get great tasting vegatarian food. Great place

Name: shivareddy2209
Title: go and get some peace
Review: It is a place where lord Krishna is Worshipped .Also we will get peace and calm when we visit it.you will Enjoy if your a krishna devotee

Name: sanjay v
Title: Nice temple with lot of peace to offer
Review: This is nice temple and very quite in middle of all crowdy places. Go for it when you are not peaceful and for sure you will get peace and smile

Name: jainneha
Title: Iskcon
Review: This is a beautiful temple of lord Krishna .it is huge and built like a magnificent temple .it is an experience in it self .

Name: Anand R
Title: Amazing to visit to Lord Krishna Temple
Review: its really wounder full designed  temple at Abids centrally located  in Hyderabad  people dost none the exact place of krishna temple but it tooo ISCON TEMPLE
